conbody.p:
RPC pipelinestypesorigin pipelineRPC pipelinesdestination pipelineRPC pipelinesTo pass data across data centers, use the following types of RPC pipelines:
origin pipeline Processes data from the origin system and passes it to the destination pipeline. Uses an RPC destination to pass data to a destination pipeline. To provide redundancy, you can define connections to multiple destination pipelines. Dev: Should I state the logic behind connection selection?
destination pipeline Processes data from the origin pipeline and passes it to the destination system. Uses an RPC origin to process data from the origin pipeline.
